title: Successful user login with valid credentials
description: Verify that a user can log in successfully using correct username and password, and the authentication state updates accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid username/email and password
Click login button

steps.assertion: Check that the login is successful and user is redirected to home screen
Verify global authentication state reflects logged-in user

title: Login failure with invalid credentials
description: Verify that login fails with incorrect username and/or password and appropriate error message is displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input invalid username/email or password
Click login button
Check that login is failed
Verify error message is visible and instructs user about invalid credentials

title: Login button disables on click to prevent duplicate requests
description: Verify the login button disables immediately after being clicked to prevent multiple authentication requests.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid username/email and password
Click login button
Ensure login button is disabled during authentication process
Verify button re-enables only after login completes or fails

title: Session persistence after app restart
description: Verify that the app maintains user login state (session persistence) after restarting or refreshing the app.

steps.description: Log in successfully
Restart or refresh the app
Verify user is still authenticated without requiring login
Authentication-dependent UI and navigation reflect logged-in state

title: Logout functionality and authentication state update
description: Verify that clicking logout properly clears authentication state and user is redirected to login screen.

steps.description: Log in successfully
Navigate to logout or trigger logout action
Verify user is logged out and authentication state is cleared
User is redirected to login screen

title: Responsive layout on multiple screen sizes and orientations
description: Verify that the home screen, sidebar, and components layout correctly adapt to different device screen widths and orientations without UI breakage.

steps.description: Open app on small, medium, and large screen sizes
Verify sidebar is responsive and navigation is accessible
Home screen content and movie dashboards layout adjust appropriately
Rotate device to landscape and portrait
UI elements remain visible and properly arranged without overlap

title: Home screen movie dashboard filtering and horizontal scrolling
description: Verify that users can select movie categories using horizontal chips and the movie cards update accordingly with smooth horizontal scrolling.

steps.description: Navigate to home screen
Scroll horizontally through category chips and select a category
Movies displayed match selected category
Horizontal scrolling is smooth without jank or stutter
Movie cards with missing images show the fallback image

title: Search functionality with real-time filtering and recommended tags
description: Verify that search input filters movie results instantly and recommended tags can be selected to refine results, including empty state handling.

steps.description: Navigate to search interface
Input partial movie title in search box
Search results update in real-time matching the input
Select one or more recommended tags
Results refine based on selected tags
Clear search input
Empty state UI is displayed when no results exist

title: Access control redirects for non-authenticated users
description: Verify that attempting to access protected routes like My Page redirects non-authenticated users to login screen with appropriate message.

steps.description: Ensure user is logged out
Attempt to navigate to My Page or other protected route
User is redirected to login screen
Message is shown indicating login is required for access

title: My Page displays user profile and watch history for authenticated users
description: Verify that authenticated users can access My Page and view their profile information and watch history correctly.

steps.description: Log in successfully
Navigate to My Page
User profile information is displayed correctly
Watch history list is visible and accurate

title: Settings page toggles save and apply accessibility preferences
description: Verify that toggling audio description (AD) and closed captioning (CC) settings updates preferences and applies them immediately.

steps.description: Navigate to Settings page
Toggle audio description setting ON and OFF
User preference is saved and applied in app behavior
Toggle closed captioning setting ON and OFF
Preference updates accordingly and affects playback if applicable

title: Settings page network usage preference saves correctly
description: Verify that users can select network usage preferences and these choices persist and apply correctly.

steps.description: Open Settings page
Change network usage preference (e.g., data saver mode)
Preference is saved and retained on app reload
App respects chosen preference during data usage scenarios

title: Custom brightness overlay toggle and application
description: Verify that users can enable custom brightness overlay and it applies visually with persistence across sessions.

steps.description: Navigate to Settings page
Toggle custom brightness overlay ON
Brightness overlay effect is applied on app screens
Restart app
Brightness overlay preference persists and effect remains active

title: Accessibility support with screen reader and semantic labeling
description: Verify that UI elements have proper semantic labels and are compatible with screen readers and logical focus order.

steps.description: Enable screen reader on device
Navigate through major UI components: home, navigation, search, settings, My Page
All interactive elements have meaningful semantic labels
Focus order follows logical and intuitive sequence

title: Offline notification and fallback UI display
description: Verify that when network connection is lost, app displays offline notification and fallback UI gracefully guiding the user.

steps.description: Simulate network loss on device
An offline notification is displayed prominently
Areas dependent on network show fallback UI with appropriate messages
Restore network connection
App recovers from offline state and normal UI returns

title: Network timeout handling shows error and allows retry
description: Verify that API/network timeout errors are caught, user is notified with error UI and can retry the operation.

steps.description: Simulate network timeout during data fetch (e.g., search or movie dashboard)
Error message or UI is shown explaining network timeout
User triggers retry
App attempts the request again and recovers if network restored

title: UI theme consistency and text readability in light and dark modes
description: Verify that the UI maintains consistent design and text remains readable in both light and dark themes across all screens.

steps.description: Switch app theme to light mode
Verify text contrast and color scheme are visually accessible
Switch app theme to dark mode
Verify text contrast and color scheme are visually accessible without readability issues
Review all major screens and components for consistent styling
